description.ko: 액체 금속 기하학과 진동하는 에너지로 번역된 음향 주파수의 시각적 탐구입니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of sound frequencies translated into liquid metal geometry and vibrating energy.

prompt: A sphere of liquid sapphire suspended in mid-air, exploding into sharp architectural spikes and vibrating ripples in response to a powerful invisible resonance. Minimalist lines in #FF4500 and #FFD700 intersect the form, creating a visual consonance of sound. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing. High-speed motion blur on the edges of the #4169E1 liquid metal, sharp focus on the central cymatic mandala. Global illumination reflects the physical weight of visualized soundwaves in a silent, #32CD32 accented void.
